dialog.content: Are you sure you want to log out?

PanelStart.title: You are connected to your account
PanelStart.content: You can see the number of trees in OpenData but also the number of trees on your private data layer.

numberOfTreesLayer.title: Number of trees in the layer

card.title: Would you like to add a tree?
card.content: To add trees on your layer you can import a data file. You will soon be able to add a tree manually from our web or mobile interface!

PanelWelcome.title: Welcome to EcoTeka !
PanelWelcome.text: Natural Solutions has been developing this plant heritage inventory and management service since July 2020. You are here on a demo of our application! You can see on the map all the trees in the world available in OpenData.

CardInfoPanel.title: Number of trees on the map

CardAbout.title: Are you a green space manager ?
CardAbout.content: You can contact us to learn more and try the first tree-based heritage inventory features.

ImportTemplate.title: A doubt with your file?
ImportTemplate.content: Make sure your file contains the following information:
ImportTemplate.download: Feel free to download our template in xlsx format

Contact.dialogContentText: Our team will be happy to answer you
